250 // 2009/06/30: rabartl: Disable Intel compiler warning #597 about the function
251 // below not ever being called. This is a bogus warning and if you comment
252 // out this function, the Teuchos unit tests for this class will not compile
253 // (see Trilinos bug 4457).
254 #ifdef __INTEL_COMPILER
255 # pragma warning(disable : 597)
256 #endif

338 
339 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
340 
341  // I should make these private but templated friends are not very portable.
342  // Besides, if a client directly calls this it will not compile in an
343  // optimized build.
344 
345  explicit ArrayView( const ArrayRCP<T> &arcp );
346 
347  explicit ArrayView( T* p, size_type size, const ArrayRCP<T> &arcp );
348 
349 #endif
350 
351 private:
352 
353  // ///////////////////////
354  // Private data members
355 
356  T *ptr_;
357  int size_;
358 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
359  ArrayRCP<T> arcp_;
360 #endif
361 
362  void setUpIterators(const ERCPNodeLookup rcpNodeLookup = RCP_ENABLE_NODE_LOOKUP);
363 
364  // ///////////////////////
365  // Private member functions
366 
367  void debug_assert_not_null() const
368  {
369 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
370  assert_not_null();
371 #endif
372  }
373 
374  void debug_assert_in_range( size_type offset, size_type size_in ) const
375  {
376  (void)offset; (void)size_in;
377 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
378  assert_in_range(offset, size_in);
379 #endif
380  }
381 
382  void debug_assert_valid_ptr() const
383  {
384 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
385  arcp_.access_private_node().assert_valid_ptr(*this);
386 #endif
387  }
388 
389 public: // Bad bad bad
390 
391  // This is a very bad breach of encapsulation but it exists to avoid
392  // problems with portability of tempalted friends
393  T* access_private_ptr() const
394  { return ptr_; }
395 
396 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
397  ArrayRCP<T> access_private_arcp() const
398  { return arcp_; }
399 #endif
400 
401 };
